description: Block-H informational drawbacks within the OSRS CMCF are related to instances where information from an artifiact is found missing, irrelevant, not congruent, or not complete based on the information supplied within the artifact.  The informational drawbacks allow for the tracking of these types of informational defficiencies.
name: OSRS Block-H Informational Drawbacks

values.description: The artifact contains Block-H related information that is uncertain, indefinite, or unclear of character or meaning.
values.value: OSRS CMCF Block-H Informational Drawback: Block-H Artifact Vague

values.description: The artifact contains Block-H related information that does not align to the current Block-H mapping.
values.value: OSRS CMCF Block-H Informational Drawback: Block-H No Relevant Category

values.description: The artifact relates to Block-H information but does not sufficiently describe the event with enough context to understand which Block-H to map to and so therefore the information that would explain this context is considered missing (or) absent.
values.value: OSRS CMCF Block-H Informational Drawback: Block-H Information Absent
